messages.subject: Mississippi
messages.msgSnippet: ... theirmath scores. They showed the number 50 very large on the screen.They tied for 50th with Mississippi........ Is it any wonder!?!?!?!!?! I think this is
messages.messageBody:
>>>>They just said the NM 4th graders are in 50th place in the US with
theirmath scores. They showed the number 50 very large on the screen.They tied for
50th with Mississippi........
Is it any wonder!?!?!?!!?!
I think this is so damn funny but sad.... not the scores, the 50th
statement.<<<<<



<g> Several years ago, there was a bumper sticker in SC: "Thank God for
Mississippi!" We were ranked 49th of 50. Poor old Mississippi!

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Mississippi
messages.msgSnippet: Melanie, There is a state website at www.mhea.org for Mississippi. I am not familiar with the area in which you are seeking. This organization is christian
messages.messageBody:
Melanie,
There is a state website at www.mhea.org for Mississippi. I am not familiar with the area in which you are seeking. This organization is christian based but they are really helpfull as to the local contact info. In my area, all that is required is an attendance record to be filed with the attendance officer in our county (with a "description" of the curriculum used). Good luck and hope they choose UNschooling. I would hate to see a family d i v i d e d over the miles when UNschooling could bring them together like nothing else can! Aleasa
